data.title: Rodtang ‘almost started another fight’ with Takeru, apologises for ONE Championship weight miss
data.description: Rodtang Jitmuangnon put his ONE Championship weight miss behind him with a crowd-pleasing exhibition on Saturday that set up a long-awaited showdown with Takeru Segawa.

data.title: Kunlavut set for semi showdown against India's George
data.description: Kunlavut Vitidsarn moved into the semi-finals of the US$420,000 BWF Korea Masters in Iksan City on Friday.

data.title: Wood spearheads Forest revival: From relegation battles to top 3
data.description: Take a glance at the Premier League table and the club which immediately catches the eye are Nottingham Forest sitting up there in third place. They are not really supposed to be there cheekily looking down on the likes of Chelsea, Arsenal and Aston Villa. Okay, it probably won

data.title: Late Amorim strike lifts Port to crucial win
data.description: Felipe Amorim struck a late winner as Port rallied to beat Zhejiang 2-1 in their AFC Champions League Two Group F match in China on Thursday night.

data.title: Dutch police arrest 57 after attacks against Israeli football fans
data.description: AMSTERDAM - Dutch police arrested 57 people after clashes between Israeli and pro-Palestinian football fans in Amsterdam, with the leaders of the Netherlands and Israel condemning the "anti-Semitic" violence.

data.title: Rodtang loses ONE Championship title on the scale after missing weight for ONE 169
data.description: Rodtang Jitmuangnon lost his ONE Championship flyweight Muay Thai title on the scale after missing weight for ONE 269.

data.title: Violent attacks in Amsterdam football match tied to antisemitism
data.description: AMSTERDAM — The Israeli government said it was sending two planes to the Netherlands on Friday to rescue citizens injured in Amsterdam after bursts of violence tied to a football game between a Dutch and an Israeli team, which Israeli and Dutch officials described as antisemitic attacks.

data.title: Yokohama dominate 10-man Buriram in 5-0 victory
data.description: Yokohama F Marinos proved too strong for 10-man Buriram United as the Japanese side claimed a 5-0 win at International Yokohama Stadium on Wednesday in the AFC Champions League Elite.

data.title: Shuttlers shine as Kunlavut, mixed doubles pair advance in Korea
data.description: Kunlavut Vitidsarn advanced to the quarter-finals of the US$420,000 BWF Korea Masters 2024 in Iksan City yesterday.

data.title: Ishii names Thai national squad with 5 newcomers
data.description: Thailand coach Masatada Ishii has called up 23 players for the two warm-up matches against Lebanon and Laos during the Fifa Day break next week.

data.title: Anatoly Malykhin, Reug Reug pulled apart in ONE 169 press conference brawl
data.description: Anatoly Malykhin and Omar “Reug Reug” Kane almost came to blows twice on a frantic day as their ONE Championship heavyweight MMA title fight threatened to boil over in Bangkok.

data.title: Port face life after Rangsan, ready for battle in Zhejiang
data.description: Thai League 1 giants Port play their first match since the shock resignation of their coach Rangsan Viwatchaichok when they take on China

data.title: Seoul honours Khunying Patama with prestigious citizenship award
data.description: In a special ceremony, Seoul awarded Khunying Patama Leeswadtrakul honorary citizenship for her impactful contributions to South Korean sports and culture.

data.title: How mental barriers affect a player's game
data.description: The psychological area that comes with the game of golf is hugely underestimated. If you don

data.title: Buriram take on Marinos with an eye on top spot
data.description: Thai League 1 champions Buriram United clash with J-League giants Yokohama F Marinos in a crucial away fixture of the AFC Champions League Elite at International Stadium Yokohama today.

data.title: George Jarvis eyes ONE Championship contract – and title shot – at Friday Fights 85
data.description: ONE Championship hopeful George Jarvis is looking to earn not just a US$100,000 contract but a title shot when he returns to Bangkok’s Lumpinee Stadium this weekend.

data.title: ONE Championship’s Denis Puric glad to have ‘real challenge’ against ‘beast’ Elias Mahmoudi at Fight Night 26
data.description: Denis Puric says ONE Championship fans are in for “fireworks” when he faces Elias Mahmoudi next month in a mouthwatering matchup with potential title implications.

data.title: ONE Championship contract would be ‘life changing’ for Junior Fairtex at Friday Fights 85
data.description: Surging Junior Fairtex is eyeing a potentially “life changing” victory at ONE Friday Fights 85, when she will look to earn a US$100,000 ONE Championship contract.

data.title: Thai wondergirl comes second in world drone racing
data.description: Wanraya “Milk” Wannapong of Thailand has ended her world  drone racing  campaign this year as runner-up to an Italian competitor.

data.title: Angels and Port set for top-of-the-table showdown
data.description: Thai League leaders Bangkok United take on third-placed Port in a crucial clash at their True Stadium on Saturday.

data.title: Nongbua blast six goals past struggling Khon Kaen
data.description: Abo Eisa picked up a brace as Nongbua Pitchaya thrashed Khon Kaen United 6-1 in a northeastern derby in  Thai League 1  on Sunday night.

data.title: Coach Rangsan resigns as Port's dismal run continues
data.description: Rangsan Viwatchaichok resigned as the head coach of Port after the Thai League 1 giants fell 2-0 at Bangkok United on Saturday night.
